Title: Brotherhood of the Damned
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Kyle Arrington, Diane Ademu-John, L.J. Smith (character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries"), Marguerite MacIntyre (story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (executive story editor)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Finn captures his brother's spirits, while the vampires remain trapped and their hunger grows.
